p: TOS was assessed using a colorimetric method based on the oxidation of a ferrous ion to a ferric ion in the presence of various oxidant species [ 94]. The results were expressed in µmol H 2O 2 equiv/L. TAC was measured using a colorimetric assay described by Erel and expressed as mmol Trolox equiv./L. [ 95]. OSI was calculated representing the ratio between TOS and TAC [ 96]. As a lipid peroxidation marker, MDA was determined using the thiobarbituric acid assay. The MDA serum concentration was expressed as nmol/mL [ 97]. The serum NO concentration was assessed using the Griess reaction and expressed as nitrite µmol/L (NOx) [ 98]. Serum total thiols were expressed as mmol GSH/mL and were determined using Ellman’s reagent [ 99].
